title: Free champion and skin

embed.description: Post with 3 votes and 18 views. Shared by Sarth13245. Lol free champion and skin

body: Someone told me that if I liked the face book page I would get a free twitch champion and a skin for him, but it didn't work and boo url or anything like that pooped up.

replies.body:
There is no twitch skin or champ, its Tristana

more information please see: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/kE7fgLLK-did-you-know-riot-offers-3-free-skins-w-champions-through-various-promotions
